author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31822 for the residual part of ```PGeometricTimingDetExtra```, never really used and now no more justified.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, the unit tests of the two affected packages run smoothly.
title: Cleaning of PGeometricTimingDetExtra
